com.bobman159.rundml.compat.select.builder

Class CompatibleSelectStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bobman159.rundml.compat.select.builder.CompatibleSelectStatement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompatibleSelectFetchStep, CompatibleSelectFromStep, CompatibleSelectListStep, CompatibleSelectOrderStep

    public class CompatibleSelectStatement
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompatibleSelectListStep, CompatibleSelectFromStep, CompatibleSelectOrderStep, CompatibleSelectFetchStep
    Defines a compatbile SQL SELECT statement that can be executed on different DBMS platforms. No guarantee is made regarding the compatibility of this SELECT builder on all DBMS platforms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompatibleSelectStatement(java.sql.Connection conn)
      Create a compatible SELECT statement to be executed on a database.
      CompatibleSelectStatement(com.bobman159.rundml.jdbc.pool.DefaultConnectionProvider provider)
      Create a SELECT statement that may be executed against a database

      Specify the DISTINCT clause for the SELECT statement.

      Execute the generated SELECT statement and return the results

      Specify the table for the SELECT statement

      Specify a GROUP BY clause for the SELECT statement.

      Specifies a HAVING clause for the SELECT statement

      Specify a ORDER BY clause for the SELECT statement.

      Specify the start of a SELECT statement
      CompatibleSelectFromStep select(com.bobman159.rundml.core.tabledef.TableDefinition tbDef)
      Specify a SELECT statement using a TableDefinition Generates a "SELECT column-name[,] FROM schema.tbName clause
      CompatibleSelectListStep selectExpression(com.bobman159.rundml.core.exprtypes.IExpression expr)
      Add an expression to be selected for the SELECT statement
      CompatibleSelectListStep selectStar()
      Specify a SELECT * to select all columns in a table for the SELECT statement
      java.lang.String toStmt()
      Returns the SQL SELECT statement text for the current statement instance.
      CompatibleSelectOrderStep where(com.bobman159.rundml.core.predicates.Predicate pred)
      Specify the WHERE clause for the SELECT statement to return table rows matching the Predicate condition.
